SELECT A.REP_ID , D.REP_NM , D.SVN_REP_URL , D.REP_TYPE_CD , A.REP_RV , A.REP_TARGET_RV , C.REP_COMMENT , C.REP_CMT_DATE , C.REP_CMT_AUTHOR , A.REP_CHG_ID , A.TICKET_ID , A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , SF_CMM1001_COM_CD_INFO('REP00004', A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REP_CHG_TYPE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND FROM REP1101 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT REP_ID, MAX(TO_NUMBER(REP_RV)) AS MAX_REP_RV, REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, REP_CHG_FILE_NM FROM REP1101 WHERE 1=1 AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# GROUP BY REP_ID, REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) B ON (A.REP_ID = B.REP_ID AND A.REP_RV = B.MAX_REP_RV AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH = B.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM = B.REP_CHG_FILE_NM) INNER JOIN REP1100 C ON (A.REP_ID = C.REP_ID AND A.REP_RV = C.REP_RV AND C.TICKET_ID = A.TICKET_ID) INNER JOIN REP1000 D ON (A.REP_ID = D.REP_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND C.REP_RV_TYPE_CD = #repRvTypeCd# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM REP1101 WHERE 1=1 AND REP_ID = A.REP_ID AND TICKET_ID = A.TICKET_ID AND REP_TARGET_RV = A.REP_RV AND REP_TARGET_FILE_PATH = A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH )
AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND = #repChgfileKind#
AND UPPER( D.REP_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_RV ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( C.REP_CMT_AUTHOR ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#
ORDER BY C.REP_CMT_DATE DESC, A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM, A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD

SELECT A.TICKET_ID , A.REP_ID , A.REP_RV , A.REP_CHG_ID , A.CI_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_NUM , A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , A.REP_CHG_SEL_CD , A.COMMIT_EMP_ID , C.REP_COMMENT , C.REP_CMT_DATE , C.REP_CMT_AUTHOR , D.REP_NM , D.DPL_REP_URL , D.REP_TYPE_CD FROM REP1102 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT TICKET_ID, CI_ID, REP_ID, JOB_ID, MAX(BLD_NUM) AS MAX_BLD_NUM, REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, REP_CHG_FILE_NM FROM REP1102 WHERE 1=1 AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# GROUP BY TICKET_ID, CI_ID, REP_ID, JOB_ID, REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) B ON ( A.TICKET_ID = B.TICKET_ID AND A.CI_ID = B.CI_ID AND A.REP_ID = B.REP_ID AND A.JOB_ID = B.JOB_ID AND A.BLD_NUM = B.MAX_BLD_NUM AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH = B.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM = B.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) INNER JOIN REP1100 C ON (A.REP_ID = C.REP_ID AND A.REP_RV = C.REP_RV AND C.TICKET_ID = A.TICKET_ID AND C.REP_RV_TYPE_CD = '03') INNER JOIN REP1000 D ON (A.REP_ID = D.REP_ID AND D.DPL_USE_CD = '01') WHERE 1=1
AND A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD != '03'
AND A.REP_CHG_SEL_CD = #repChgSelCd#
AND UPPER( D.REP_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_RV ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( C.REP_CMT_AUTHOR ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.BLD_NUM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
ORDER BY A.CI_ID, A.REP_ID, A.REP_RV, A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH

SELECT A.TICKET_ID , A.REP_ID , A.REP_RV , A.REP_CHG_ID , A.CI_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_NUM , A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , A.COMMIT_EMP_ID FROM REP1102 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND A.CI_ID = #ciId# AND A.REP_ID = #repId# AND A.REP_CHG_SEL_CD = '01'

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REP1100 ( TICKET_ID , REP_ID , REP_RV , REP_RV_TYPE_CD , REP_COMMENT , REP_CMT_DATE , REP_CMT_AUTHOR , REP_CHG_FILE_CNT ) VALUES ( #ticketId# , #repId# , #repRv# , #repRvTypeCd# , #repComment# , TO_DATE(#repCmtDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , #repCmtAuthor# , #repChgFileCnt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REP1100 SET REP_COMMENT = #repComment# , REP_CMT_DATE = #repCmtDate# , REP_CMT_AUTHOR = #repCmtAuthor# , REP_CHG_FILE_CNT = #repChgFileCnt# WHERE 1=1 AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND REP_ID = #repId# AND REP_RV = #repRv#

INSERT INTO REP1101 ( TICKET_ID , REP_ID , REP_RV , REP_CHG_ID , REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , REP_CHG_FILE_NM , REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , REP_TARGET_RV , REP_TARGET_FILE_PATH , COMMIT_EMP_ID ) VALUES ( #ticketId# , #repId# , #repRv# , #newRepChgId# , #repChgTypeCd# , #repChgFilePath# , #repChgFileNm# , #repChgFileKind# , #repTargetRv# , #repTargetFilePath# , #commitEmpId# )

INSERT INTO REP1102 ( TICKET_ID , REP_ID , REP_RV , REP_CHG_ID , CI_ID , JOB_ID , BLD_NUM , REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , REP_CHG_FILE_NM , REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , REP_CHG_SEL_CD , COMMIT_EMP_ID ) VALUES ( #ticketId# , #repId# , #repRv# , #newRepChgId# , #ciId# , #jobId# , #bldNum# , #repChgTypeCd# , #repChgFilePath# , #repChgFileNm# , #repChgFileKind# , #repChgSelCd# , #commitEmpId# )
